query: create table j as with j(value) as (values ('{"a":1,"b":2,"c":3}'), ('{"a":4,"b":5,"c":6}')) select * from j
create table t as with t as (select *, a + b + c as sum from (select value as input, value->>'$."a"' as a, value->>'$."b"' as b, value->>'$."c"' as c from j)) select * from t
select json_object('a', a, 'b', b, 'c', c, 'sum', sum) as json from t
select json_object('input', json(input), 'args', json_array(a, b, c), 'sum', sum) || printf('%c', char(10)) as line from t
